IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE HEALTHCARE SERVICES OF YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER FOR THE COMMUNITIES IT SERVES, INCLUDING GRANDKIDS CHILD CARE CENTER.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER FOUNDATION IS TO SUPPORT THE HEALTHCARE SERVICES OF YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER (YVMC) FOR THE COMMUNITIES IT SERVES. OUR PURPOSE IS TO HELP BUILD A STRONGER MEDICAL CENTER WITH A SECURE FUTURE - A TASK AND RESPONSIBILITY THAT MUST BE SHARED BY ALL STAKEHOLDERS. THE CHALLENGES FACING YVMC ARE SUBSTANTIAL AND WE ARE COMMITTED TO BUILD FUNDRAISING PROGRAMS AND SUSTAIN THE MOMENTUM YVMC NEEDS TO SUCCEED. TO MEET THESE CHALLENGES, THE FOUNDATION STAFF AND VOLUNTEER BOARD DETERMINE AND REVIEW ANNUALLY THE FOLLOWING AREAS OF ENGAGEMENT AND SUPPORT: SPECIAL EVENTS, ANNUAL FUND SOLICITATIONS AND GRANT WRITING. ALL FUNDS RECEIVED THROUGH THESE AREAS ARE GRANTED TO THE YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER AND THE COMMUNITY PROJECTS THEY SERVE.
IRS990.Desc: SUPPORT HEALTH CARE FACILITIES LOCATED IN NORTHWEST COLORADO, PRIMARILY THE YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER AND EDUCATIONAL EXPERIENCES FOR PRESCHOOL CHILDREN AT GRANDKIDS CHILD CARE CENTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Describe the intended uses of the organization's endowment funds: COMMUNITY RESOURCE CENTER ENDOWMENT FUND HAS BEEN PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED BY DONORS. THE COMMUNITY RESOURCE CENTER ENDOWMENT FUND HELPS SUPPORT THE ALL VOLUNTEER COMMUNITY RESOURCE CENTER LOCATED IN YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER. THE TEMPORARILY RESTRICTED NET ASSETS CONSIST OF DONATIONS WHOSE USE HAS BEEN RESTRICTED BY DONORS. THESE TEMPORARILY RESTRICTED ASSETS ARE AVAILABLE TO SUPPORT THE FOLLOWING PROGRAMS: YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER - ACUTE CARE, GRANDKIDS AND OTHER COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES.

UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS: MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THEIR INCOME TAX POSITIONS UNDER THE GUIDANCE INCLUDED IN ASC 740. BASED ON THEIR REVIEW, MANAGEMENT HAS NOT IDENTIFIED ANY MATERIAL UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS TO BE RECORDED OR DISCLOSED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.
REVENUE ON BOOKS, NOT ON RETURN: Special Event Expense Reclassed from Expense & Net Against Revenue 65,160 Change in interest in net assets of yampa valley community foundation 681 Total 65,841
REVENUE ON RETURN, NOT ON BOOKS: Gain on sale of equipment reclassed from Expense to Revenue 72
EXPENSE ON BOOKS, NOT ON RETURN: Special Event Expense Reclassed from Expense & Net Against Revenue 65,160
EXPENSE ON RETURN, NOT ON BOOKS: Gain on sale of equipment reclassed from Expense to Revenue 72

Organization's procedures for monitoring the use of grant funds: GRANTS TO THE YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER (YVMC): THE DEPARTMENT WITHIN THE YVMC PREPARES A FORMAL REQUEST FOR GRANTS THAT ARE APPROVED BY THE MANAGEMENT OF THE YVMC AND THE FOUNDATION. A GRANT (REIMBURSEMENT) IS MADE TO THE YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER AFTER PURCHASE HAVE BEEN PROCESSED OR EXPENDITURES ARE MADE. GRANTS TO OTHERS: APPLICATIONS FOR ASSISTANCE ARE COMPLETED BY INDIVIDUALS. A COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR SCREENING THE APPLICATIONS AND MONITORING AFTER THE GRANT IS RECEIVED.

CEO Compensation: Compensation is paid by Yampa Valley Medical Center, a related organization. Please see schedule o, part vi, lines 15a and 15b narrative for information on how compensation is determined.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Schedule M, Part I, Column B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE NUMBER REPORTED IN COLUMN B REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF DONATIONS RECEIVED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Changes to Organizational Documents since Prior 990: THE ORGANIZATION'S BYLAWS AND ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION WERE UPDATED TO REFLECT THE NAME CHANGE FROM HEALTHCARE FOUNDATION FOR THE YAMPA VALLEY TO YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER FOUNDATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6, 7A, & 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DESCRIBE CIRCUMSTANCES FOR HAVING MEMBERS: YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF THE FOUNDATION. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER (YVMC) APPROVES ANY AMENDMENTS TO THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION AND BY-LAWS. IN ADDITION, ONE OF THE YVMC TRUSTEES AND THE YVMC CEO SERVE ON THE FOUNDATION SEVEN MEMBER EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Process to Review the Form 990: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTING FIRM WITH THE ASSISTANCE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS THE DRAFT OF THE 990 PRIOR TO COMPLETION. THE FINAL DRAFT IS APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING FORM 990 WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Process for Monitoring Compliance with Conflict of Interest Policy: BOARD MEMBERS REVIEW AND SIGN AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY. THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE ARE DILIGENT IN THE MONITORING OF THE POLICY AT MONTHLY BOARD MEETINGS. IMMEDIATE TERMINATION IS THE RESULT OF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Review of CEO or Top Mgmt Official Compensation: COMPENSATION IS PAID THROUGH YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER. THE HUMAN RESOURCES EXECUTIVE USES VARIOUS COMPENSATION SURVEYS TO PREPARE AN ANALYSIS ON CEO COMPENSATION FOR THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES TO REVIEW. THE BOARD'S EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE ANALYSIS AND USES IT TO DETERMINE THE CEO'S COMPENSATION. EVERY FEW YEARS, AT ITS DISCRETION, THE YVMC BOARD OF TRUSTEES ENGAGES AN EXTERNAL COMPENSATION CONSULTANT FIRM TO PERFORM AN EXECUTIVE TOTAL COMPENSATION REVIEW THAT IS PARTLY USED TO DETERMINE COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Review of Other Officer or Key Employees Compensation: THE HUMAN RESOURCES EXECUTIVE USES VARIOUS COMPENSATION SURVEYS TO PREPARE AN ANALYSIS FOR OTHER OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES COMPENSATION WHERE A SIMILAR AND COMPARABLE JOB POSITION IS AVAILABLE FOR THE CEO TO REVIEW. THE CEO REVIEWS THE ANALYSIS AND USES IT TO DETERMINE THE OFFICERS OR KEY EMPLOYEES COMPENSATION. THE CEO ALSO HAS THE ABILITY TO REVIEW THE SALARY SURVEYS DIRECTLY. EVERY FEW YEARS, AT ITS DISCRETION, THE YVMC BOARD OF TRUSTEES ENGAGES AN EXTERNAL COMPENSATION CONSULTANT FIRM TO PERFORM AN EXECUTIVE TOTAL COMPENSATION REVIEW THAT IS PARTLY USED TO DETERMINE COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Governing Documents Available to the Public: THE MANAGEMENT DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST AT THE YAMPA VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER FOUNDATION OFFICE. FINANCIAL INFORMATION IS PROVIDED ON THE ORGANIZATION'S ANNUAL REPORT THAT IS DISTRIBUTED TO THE COMMUNITY.
OTHER CHANGES IN NET ASSETS: Change in interest in net assets of yampa valley community foundation 681
